TitleEnglish: Beast Wars II: Lio Convoy in Imminent Danger!
SummaryEnglish: The Beast Wars between the Maximals and Predacons intensifies and complicates upon the arrival of Majin Zarak, a titanic and terrifying Transformer.
Aliases: Beast Wars II: Lio Convoy's Close Call!
Beast Wars: Super Lifeform Transformers Special
Transformers: Beast Wars II: The Movie
Beast Wars Second: Lio Convoy kiki ippatsu!
Bîsuto uôzu chô seimeitai Toransufômâ supesharu
